overview: In a tsotsil community from south Mexico, where all the sounds come to life, the musical tradition of a family of musicians is transmitted from one generation to another: from the grandfather, who lives his last melodies; the son, who assumes the position of traditional musician; and the grandson who has the pleasure to continue with the musical memory of his family.

production_companies.name: Escuela de Cine Documental de San Cristóbal de Las Casas

title: Jvobtik – Our Music
